thread.title: Natasha Lamb
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Natasha Lamb

author: Natasha Lamb
title: Natasha Lamb
text: I ordered Barbour jacket for my husband for Christmas. It was delivered 2 days later! There were lots of notifications about when the parcel had to be delivered, very convenient. Unfortunately the size was wrong! But I was able to send the wrong coat back (for free!) and got the right size just 3 days later. Very happy with the product and the service!
